HowToPlay.title: How to Play
HowToPlay.gameObjectiveDesc: Think fast and be creative! Answer prompts based on themes and earn points for unique answers.
HowToPlay.step1: Join or create a room and wait for at least 3 players.
HowToPlay.step2: Each round, you'll see a theme and need to provide a relevant answer.
HowToPlay.step3: Be quick! In timed mode, faster answers get more points.
HowToPlay.step4: Avoid duplicate answers - they won't earn any points!
HowToPlay.scoringDesc: Earn points for unique answers. First valid answers get bonus points in timed mode!
HowToPlay.tip1: Be creative and think outside the box!
HowToPlay.tip2: Keep an eye on the timer in timed mode.
HowToPlay.tip3: Try to avoid obvious answers that others might think of.
